feature.label: DARPA CASE VERDICT Feature
feature.description: The VERDICT feature consists of an OSATE plugin and a set of VERDICT back-end programs invoked by the plugin. The plugin has two ways to call the back-end programs; it can run an executable jar (verdict-bundle-<VERSION>-capsule.jar) in a subprocess or it can run a Docker image (gehighassurance/verdict) in a temporary container.
